text: Perkin Warbeck ( 1474 - 23 November 1499) was an impostor and pretender to the English throne during the reign of Henry VII of England. He claimed to be Richard of Shrewsbury, one of the Princes in the Tower. He attempted to invade England but was captured after the Second Cornish Uprising (1497) and executed. == References == Category:1474 births Category:1499 deaths Category:Executed English people
title: Perkin Warbeck
